description:
San Francisco-based BillForward a YCombinator company is comprised of talented and passionate folks who are excited by the challenges and opportunities of subscription billing.  We offer a flexible and innovative billing platform, which gives any type of recurring-payment based businesses the ability to bill customers for sophisticated products and carry out in-depth revenue analysis.

Launched in Jan 2013 the platform has already gained great traction in the Telecoms, SaaS, Product as Service and Platform as a Service industries, where product managers and CFOâs have realized that the ability to change their offering in hours, rather than weeks, can give them an edge on the competition.

# Powerful Subscriptions, Faster Implementation
## Billforward is the leading solution for companies looking to boost their recurring revenue.
### Request a Call:
Email*
First name
Last name
Message
## **Let’s talk billing.**
  * API-first
  * Multiple integrations- including Salesforce, QuickBooks, HubSpot, Google Data Studio, Commercetools, Avalara, Chartmogul, Airbyte, Shuttle and Xero
  * Supports Headless commerce
  * Rapid response from our dedicated support team
  * The most competitive rates


_Billforward also offers an automated switch facility to those looking to migrate from an existing subscription provider._
![done-2-docker](https://www.billforward.io/hubfs/done-2-docker.webp)
####  Complex Billing Simplified
Flat-fees, event and usage-based metered billing, volume and tiered discounts, coupons and free trials - no matter what your business model is, we can support you.
####  Full API Access
Billforward's developer-friendly, headless platform allows full API access, so you can choose the best of breed tools to meet your needs. And you can always use Billforward's UI.
####  Payment Gateway Agnostic
Don't get "Processor Lock-in". Billforward works with any payment gateway to give you the freedom to take your business any direction you might want.
####  Powerful Dunning
Billforward utilises intelligent dunning techniques to retrieve missed payments. Invoices marked as unpaid are automatically scheduled to be re-processed according to the dunning lines.
![done-2](https://www.billforward.io/hubfs/done-2.webp)
### **New to subscriptions?**
Join the hundreds of other companies that have successfully launched subscriptions using**Billforward!**
Our team of billing experts will give you all the help you need to create and sell your subscriptions - and turn you into a recurring revenue business.
# Success Stories
![CIAL D&B logo without image-2](https://www.billforward.io/hubfs/CIAL%20D%26B%20logo%20without%20image-2.webp)
**CIAL** is a part of the global D&B network, working across 43 countries in Latin America and the Caribbean with millions of corporate clients, providing sophisticated business intelligence.
**CHALLENGE** CIAL certainly wanted to move to a subscription business, but they recognised that some of their clients wanted to keep access to one off purchases, all inside the same multi-currency system with automated invoicing and granular reporting.
[ Read more ](https://www.billforward.io/<http:/www.domain.com>)
![wifinity logo without image-3](https://www.billforward.io/hubfs/wifinity%20logo%20without%20image-3.webp)
**Wifinity** is a UK-based ISP specialising in wireless solutions for customers in high density sites, such as student accommodation, military barracks and holiday parks. 
**CHALLENGE** Wifinity has a complex use case, requiring flexibility over subscription length and product selection (connection speed and number of connected devices on each account). Wifinity also wanted the ability to upgrade, downgrade, pause and cancel subscriptions mid period. 
[ Read more ](https://www.billforward.io/<http:/www.domain.com>)
![HappyFamilyOrganics \(1\)](https://www.billforward.io/hubfs/HappyFamilyOrganics%20\(1\).webp)
**Happy Family Organics** is the market leader in the US for organic baby food. Their mission is to give babies their healthiest, happiest beginning by offering parents organic, thoughtfully-made food. 
**CHALLENGE** HFO has always seen the value of brand loyalty, and how this can be achieved via subscription. The difficulty they faced was in finding a platform where a subscription could evolve as their child clients also grew, delivering the right baby food from birth to 8+ months old.
[ Read more ](https://www.billforward.io/<http:/www.domain.com>)

**Billforward: Your Go-To Subscription Billing Solution**

Founded in 2013 and hailing from the vibrant tech hub of San Francisco, Billforward has swiftly become a cornerstone for businesses that rely on subscription-based revenue models. As a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch S14, this small yet talented team of eight is dedicated to revolutionizing how companies manage their subscription billing and analytics.

### Mission
Billforward aims to streamline the intricacies of subscription billing, offering a flexible and innovative platform that empowers various industries, including Telecoms, SaaS, and PaaS. They help businesses shift their billing strategies from weeks to mere hours, providing a competitive edge.

### Features and Offerings
Their robust platform includes:
- **Subscription Management**: Navigate the complexities of recurring billing with ease.
- **Recurring Billing**: Efficiently manage ongoing payments with various billing strategies.
- **Quotes and Contracts**: Easily create and manage client contracts.
- **Integrations**: Seamlessly connect with popular tools like Salesforce, QuickBooks, and HubSpot.
- **Reporting and Analytics**: Harness data to drive informed business decisions.
- **Powerful Dunning Features**: Automatically handle missed payments intelligently.

Billforward’s interface is built with developers in mind, offering full API access. This not only allows users to integrate their own tools but also keeps them flexible and unencumbered by any "processor lock-in."

### Customer Success Stories
Numerous businesses have successfully migrated to Billforward's platform—including CIAL, Wifinity, and Happy Family Organics. These companies have managed to enhance their billing flexibility, streamline operations, and ultimately boost their recurring revenues thanks to Billforward’s tailored solutions.

### Join the Subscription Revolution
Whether you're a product manager looking to enhance pricing strategies or a finance team aiming to simplify accounting and taxes, Billforward has the expertise to guide you through the subscription landscape. With their dedicated support team and commitment to customer success, they stand as a leading solution for businesses keen on embracing the subscription economy.

For more details, visit their website: [Billforward](https://www.billforward.io/) and discover how they can help you transform your billing processes into a streamlined engine for growth.
